snippet.title: 💟 Block'Em - Out on Steam 8th September! 💟
snippet.description:
Did you hear the great news? Block’Em is set to release on 8th September!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1529220/BlockEm/ 

An exciting mix of platform and puzzle, Block’Em is an action-filled block-building party game for 2 to 4 players. The controls are simple but the road to victory is complex: players must be the first to reach the goal or be the last Blocky standing.

IF YOU CAN’T BLOCK’EM, JOIN’EM! 💟
🟨Twitter: https://twitter.com/blockem_game 
🟥Discord: https://discord.com/invite/HtKz94xPgz 
🟪Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blockemgame
🟩 Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/CurveGamesOfficial
